rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entry hall with minimalistic decor and ample natural lighting through floor-to-ceiling windows. Provides transition from outdoors to indoors.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open plan living space combining seating area and dining space with large west-facing windows to maximize natural light and provide scenic views, in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern minimalist kitchen design featuring integrated cabinetry and floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample ventilation, adjacent to the living area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Utilizes north-east or east oriented windows for optimum lighting and energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern minimalist bathroom design complementing the master bedroom layout with natural light ventilation, ensuring privacy.

openings.details: Floor-to-ceiling window maximizing sunlight and offering panoramic views. Uses energy efficient glass for insulation.
Large floor-to-ceiling window designed to enhance natural light and ventilation in the kitchen area.
